column4: Microsoft sues Kyocera over cell phones  seeks U.S. injunction
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Microsoft Corp sued Kyocera Corp for patent infringement on Friday  alleging the Japanese company's Duraforce  Hydro and Brigadier cell phone lines violate seven Microsoft patents.

column4: UPDATE 1-Microsoft sues Kyocera over cell phones  seeks U.S. injunction
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  March 6 Microsoft Corp  sued Kyocera Corp for patent infringement on Friday  alleging the Japanese company's Duraforce  Hydro and Brigadier cell phone lines violate seven Microsoft patents.
